featured.text: Some critics have said that MOOCs promote an unrealistic one-size-fits-all model of higher education and that there is no replacement for true dialogues between professors and their students.

definition.zh_def: 對話；交談，通常指兩人或多人的口頭交流。
definition.en_def: A conversation between two or more people.
definition.example: The dialogue in the play was both witty and engaging.
